spatial_accuracy.notes: General room placement is accurate. Door orientation for Bedroom 1 is inverted compared to the plan (swings into the hallway/entrance area instead of the room). Window placement in the lounge is slightly extended.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present, including the niche elements like L'dry and Robe. Wall thicknesses are consistent. The garage remains a detached structure as per the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture scale is consistent with room dimensions. Some creative liberty taken with bedroom layouts not explicitly detailed in the 2D plan, but they remain functional and logically placed.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric projection and clean geometry. Textures and labels from the floor plan are well-integrated into the 3D surfaces. Lighting is clear and shadows are soft.

detected_errors.description: Door to Bedroom 1 swings outward into the hallway instead of inward toward the Robe wall as indicated on the floor plan.
The sliding door/window in the Lounge/Balcony area appears wider than the proportions indicated in the 2D schematic.
The Entry door swing direction is slightly misinterpreted relative to the linen closet niche.
